title: Kasia Niewiadoma Distraught after SD Worx Domination Spoils Strade Bianche Hopes
content:
‘It just sucks being all the time there but not getting the victory’ - Polish rider frustrated by near misses in Strade Bianche.

Read the full article at Kasia Niewiadoma Distraught after SD Worx Domination Spoils Strade Bianche Hopes on Velo.
author: sstokes
